name: ScopeOfWork
description: Document Model Type for scope of work data types

operations.name: CreateDeliverable
operations.schema:
input CreateDeliverableInput {
    id: ID!
    title: String!
    description: String
    status: DeliverableStatus
    owner: Owner
}

type Owner {
  id: ID
  imgUrl: String
  name: String
  code: String
}

enum DeliverableStatus {
    TODO
    IN_PROGRESS
    DELIVERED
    BLOCKED
    WONT_DO
}

# add new types here

operations.name: UpdateDeliverableProgress
DeleteDeliverable
UpdateDeliverableStatus
UpdateDeliverableDetails
AddKeyResultToDeliverable
operations.schema:
input AddKeyResultToDeliverableInput {
    deliverableId: ID!
    id: ID!
    title: String!
    link: String!
}

# add new types here

operations.name: UpdateKeyResult
RemoveKeyResultFromDeliverable
SetDeliverableBudget
